tool_description: Validates proposed motor parameter changes against safety limits and operational constraints before implementation.

operating_mode.description: Operating mode: normal, high_load, maintenance, emergency

error_messages: Motor not found: The specified motor_id does not exist in the system configuration.
Parameter out of range: One or more proposed parameters exceed safe operating limits for this motor model.
Invalid safety factor: safety_factor must be between 1.0 and 2.0. Higher values provide more conservative operation.
Invalid operating mode: Use one of: normal, high_load, maintenance, emergency.
Temperature out of range: environmental_temp must be between -40 and 80 degrees Celsius.
Parameter combination unsafe: The combination of proposed parameters may cause motor damage or inefficient operation.
usage: Specify motor_id and at least one proposed parameter change. The tool validates against motor specifications and safety limits.

validation_passed.description: Whether all proposed parameters passed validation

validation_details.description: Detailed validation results for each parameter

safety_warnings.description: Array of safety warnings if any

recommended_adjustments.description: Suggested parameter modifications if validation failed
